cause.description:
Retrain the thinking amungst youths today so there prejudices are eliminated just because one may be different from another. Show them that just because of race, size difference (whether it be height or weight), physical disabilities or whatever orientation, we are all a member of this society and have to stop this senseless violence and bond together before we end up seriously physically or mentally killing each other.
1. It is our right not to be bullied.
cause.mission: Reduce teasing and bullying amungst youths
cause.name: People Against Bullying
